mdRecord.dcterms:title: Giles, Lionel (?) to Henry Faulds; 03 of 03
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Giles, Lionel (?) to Henry Faulds regarding a Dr. Barnett and the return of an image that Faulds let Barnett borrow for a publication. Also, thanks for pamphlet Faulds sent. Enclosed: Image with caption "A Chinese Bank Note, 1898" at bottom.; 2 leaves; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
